props.name: defaultExpanded
props.description: If true, expands the accordion by default

props.name: disabled
props.description: If true, the component will be disabled

props.name: disableGutters
props.description: If true, it removes the margin between two expanded accordion items

props.name: expanded
props.description: If true, expands the accordion, otherwise collapse it

props.name: onChange
props.description: Callback fired when the expand/collapse state is changed

props.name: square
props.description: If true, rounded corners are disabled

props.name: TransitionComponent
props.description: The component used for the transition

props.name: TransitionProps
props.description: Props applied to the transition element
